attributes.action: Stop David Cameron from giving extra money to his special advisors
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron stated:
"The termination of their employment has been sudden and unexpected, and he does not wish to exacerbate an already difficult and uncertain time for them by inferring that their long and loyal service is not fully recognised."

This happens all the time to much lower paid, more hard working citizens, who find it harder to get jobs.
attributes.background:
Stop David Cameron from giving extra money, the public's money, to his so called special advisors, who are already getting a pay off that most people can only dream of.
It is the public's hard working money that he seems to be allowed to take and dish out!
